mapper.select: select (select clienttype from clienttype where id=typeid) clienttype, (select name from staff where staff.staffno=client.`staffNo`) staffname,client.* from client
mapper.sql: number, name, linkman, phone, address, borndate, paymentDays, paymentSize, staffNo, counselorName, sheng, shi, qv, remark, taxpayerNumber, registerPhone, bank, bankNumber, registerAddress, other, typeId, carNo, date, Integral
mapper.select:
select
distinct
from client
order by ${orderByClause}
